column1: The payment service is currently unavailable.

column1: Your Mollie Account is reachable from the Magento store, but seems to lack payment methods.
column2: Your Mollie Account is reachable from the Magento store, but seems to lack payment methods.

column1: Warning: It seems you have not set a webhook in your Mollie profile.
column2: Warning: It seems you have not set a webhook in your Mollie profile. Without the webhook orders will stay in pending status.

column1: Your Magento version is incompatible with this module!
column2: Your Magento version is incompatible with this module!

column1: Mollie currently provides %d payment methods, while this module only supports %d method slots.
column2: Mollie currently provides %d payment methods, while this module only supports %d method slots.

column1: To enable all supported payment methods, get the latest Magento plugin from the Mollie Modules list.
column2: To enable all supported payment methods, get the latest Magento plugin from the Mollie Modules list. If no newer version is available, please contact Mollie BV.

column1: These aren‘t needed any longer; you might as well delete them.
column2: These aren‘t needed any longer; you might as well delete them.

column1: You can find your Api Key in your Mollie Profile.
column2:
You can find your Api Key in your Mollie Profile. Your Mollie account is connected to the webshop through this key.
Api Keys begin with either test_ or live_.

A webhook URL can equally be set in your Mollie Profile. The webhook is the page Mollie calls to communicate the payment status.
Your webhook URL is:
